title: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the package view selection and dialog, the Search dialog is initialized with the fully qualified name. However, this search does not return any results.
EB: When searching for declarations via the package view selection and dialog, the Search dialog should first attempt to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the Search dialog.
4. Enter a search query for declarations.
5. Click the search button.

Expected behavior:
The search should return relevant results based on the entered search query.

Actual behavior:
The search does not return any results.

NOTES: (No additional notes provided)
